description: As a Diploma in Electronics Engineering student, I have a strong understanding of both theoretical and practical aspects of electronic systems, instrumentation, microcontroller programming, and control systems. For my final project, I designed a mini Automated Storage and Retrieval System (ASRS) based on a PLC Haiwell as an application of automation technology.

school: Islamic Senior High School of Sultan Agung 1 Semarang
description: High school graduate majoring in Natural Sciences, with a basic understanding of science and mathematics.
